amendment.description: An amendment numbered 137 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to provide funding for the Defense Health Agency to submit a report to Congress on options to ensure that active-duty service members who are suffering from Traumatic Brain Injuries (TBI) and Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) are able to participate in clinical trials.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crenshaw amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crenshaw amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crenshaw amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
